name: Rockets Deep Racey Space Run
description:
In Rockets Deep Space Run: Endless Cosmo you are travelling through space and you have to protect yourself from the debris and meteoroids. It is a hyperspace travel through revolving portals. It is a vast cosmos and you have to reach your destination without colliding with the rotating tubes. Make sure your landing confirmed by the international airspace before heading out. You have several mini rocket at your disposal. You are the master of crossy space jump. You ships are called racey rockets. Collect coins and buy new cool and crazy rockets.

Rotate clockwise and anti-clockwise with one finger gameplay to protect from the rotating hurdles or obstacles. There are several different kind of portals which you have to pass through without colliding. There are epic tracks to move around.

Game Feature
• Simple tap controls in arcade gameplay
• Great graphics
• Difficult gameplay
• Wonderful space environment
• Several different spaceships
• Different portal structures

Go into space with best rockets at your disposal in Rockets Deep Space Run: Endless Cosmo and avoid obstacles. You are a racey rocket pilot in a deep space.
